name: Dreamcatcher (Octopi with Hats)
description:
The world of dreams wages a constant war against the Wellspring of Nightmare. Kathy, a young Oneironaut, a traveller of dreams gifted with enormous potential, has been tasked with collecting several Dream Fragments for safekeeping. The minions of Nightmare may try to stop her, but she must persevere...

An artistic game featuring hand-drawn art created by Tromlui.
